class.name: TreeItem
class.brief_description: Control for a single item inside a [Tree].
class.description: Control for a single item inside a [Tree]. May have child [TreeItem]s and be styled as well as contain buttons. You can remove a [TreeItem] by using [method Object.free].

method.name: add_button
method.description: Adds a button with [Texture2D] [code]button[/code] at column [code]column[/code]. The [code]button_idx[/code] index is used to identify the button when calling other methods. If not specified, the next available index is used, which may be retrieved by calling [method get_button_count] immediately after this method. Optionally, the button can be [code]disabled[/code] and have a [code]tooltip[/code].

method.name: call_recursive
method.description: Calls the [code]method[/code] on the actual TreeItem and its children recursively. Pass parameters as a comma separated list.

method.name: clear_custom_bg_color
method.description: Resets the background color for the given column to default.

method.name: clear_custom_color
method.description: Resets the color for the given column to default.

method.name: clear_opentype_features
method.description: Removes all OpenType features.

method.name: create_child
method.description: Creates an item and adds it as a child. The new item will be inserted as position [code]idx[/code] (the default value [code]-1[/code] means the last position), or it will be the last child if [code]idx[/code] is higher than the child count.

method.name: deselect
method.description: Deselects the given column.

method.name: erase_button
method.description: Removes the button at index [code]button_idx[/code] in column [code]column[/code].

method.name: get_button
method.description: Returns the [Texture2D] of the button at index [code]button_idx[/code] in column [code]column[/code].

method.name: get_button_count
method.description: Returns the number of buttons in column [code]column[/code]. May be used to get the most recently added button's index, if no index was specified.

method.name: get_button_tooltip
method.description: Returns the tooltip string for the button at index [code]button_idx[/code] in column [code]column[/code].

method.name: get_cell_mode
method.description: Returns the column's cell mode.

method.name: get_child
method.description: Returns a child item by its index (see [method get_child_count]). This method is often used for iterating all children of an item. Negative indices access the children from the last one.

method.name: get_child_count
method.description: Returns the number of child items.

method.name: get_children
method.description: Returns an array of references to the item's children.

method.name: get_custom_bg_color
method.description: Returns the custom background color of column [code]column[/code].

method.name: get_custom_color
method.description: Returns the custom color of column [code]column[/code].

method.name: get_custom_font
method.description: Returns custom font used to draw text in the column [code]column[/code].

method.name: get_custom_font_size
method.description: Returns custom font size used to draw text in the column [code]column[/code].

method.name: get_expand_right
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if [code]expand_right[/code] is set.

method.name: get_first_child
method.description: Returns the TreeItem's first child.

method.name: get_icon
method.description: Returns the given column's icon [Texture2D]. Error if no icon is set.

method.name: get_icon_max_width
method.description: Returns the column's icon's maximum width.

method.name: get_icon_modulate
method.description: Returns the [Color] modulating the column's icon.

method.name: get_icon_region
method.description: Returns the icon [Texture2D] region as [Rect2].

method.name: get_index
method.description: Returns the node's order in the tree. For example, if called on the first child item the position is [code]0[/code].

method.name: get_language
method.description: Returns item's text language code.

method.name: get_metadata
method.description: Returns the metadata value that was set for the given column using [method set_metadata].

method.name: get_next
method.description: Returns the next TreeItem in the tree or a null object if there is none.

method.name: get_next_visible
method.description: Returns the next visible TreeItem in the tree or a null object if there is none. If [code]wrap[/code] is enabled, the method will wrap around to the first visible element in the tree when called on the last visible element, otherwise it returns [code]null[/code].

method.name: get_opentype_feature
method.description: Returns OpenType feature [code]tag[/code] of the item's text.

method.name: get_parent
method.description: Returns the parent TreeItem or a null object if there is none.

method.name: get_prev
method.description: Returns the previous TreeItem in the tree or a null object if there is none.

method.name: get_prev_visible
method.description: Returns the previous visible TreeItem in the tree or a null object if there is none. If [code]wrap[/code] is enabled, the method will wrap around to the last visible element in the tree when called on the first visible element, otherwise it returns [code]null[/code].

method.name: get_range
method.description: Returns the value of a [constant CELL_MODE_RANGE] column.

method.name: get_range_config
method.description: Returns a dictionary containing the range parameters for a given column. The keys are "min", "max", "step", and "expr".

method.name: get_suffix
method.description: Gets the suffix string shown after the column value.

method.name: get_text
method.description: Returns the given column's text.

method.name: get_text_alignment
method.description: Returns the given column's text alignment.

method.name: get_text_direction
method.description: Returns item's text base writing direction.

method.name: get_tooltip
method.description: Returns the given column's tooltip.

method.name: get_tree
method.description: Returns the [Tree] that owns this TreeItem.

method.name: is_button_disabled
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the button at index [code]button_idx[/code] for the given column is disabled.

method.name: is_checked
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the given column is checked.

method.name: is_editable
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if column [code]column[/code] is editable.

method.name: is_indeterminate
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the given column is indeterminate.

method.name: is_selectable
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if column [code]column[/code] is selectable.

method.name: is_selected
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if column [code]column[/code] is selected.

method.name: move_after
method.description: Moves this TreeItem right after the given [code]item[/code]. [b]Note:[/b] You can't move to the root or move the root.

method.name: move_before
method.description: Moves this TreeItem right before the given [code]item[/code]. [b]Note:[/b] You can't move to the root or move the root.

method.name: remove_child
method.description: Removes the given child [TreeItem] and all its children from the [Tree]. Note that it doesn't free the item from memory, so it can be reused later. To completely remove a [TreeItem] use [method Object.free].

method.name: select
method.description: Selects the column [code]column[/code].

method.name: set_button
method.description: Sets the given column's button [Texture2D] at index [code]button_idx[/code] to [code]button[/code].

method.name: set_button_disabled
method.description: If [code]true[/code], disables the button at index [code]button_idx[/code] in column [code]column[/code].

method.name: set_cell_mode
method.description: Sets the given column's cell mode to [code]mode[/code]. See [enum TreeCellMode] constants.

method.name: set_checked
method.description: If [code]true[/code], the column [code]column[/code] is checked. Clears column's indeterminate status.

method.name: set_custom_bg_color
method.description: Sets the given column's custom background color and whether to just use it as an outline.

method.name: set_custom_color
method.description: Sets the given column's custom color.

method.name: set_custom_draw
method.description: Sets the given column's custom draw callback to [code]callback[/code] method on [code]object[/code]. The [code]callback[/code] should accept two arguments: the [TreeItem] that is drawn and its position and size as a [Rect2].

method.name: set_custom_font
method.description: Sets custom font used to draw text in the column [code]column[/code].

method.name: set_custom_font_size
method.description: Sets custom font size used to draw text in the column [code]column[/code].

method.name: set_editable
method.description: If [code]true[/code], column [code]column[/code] is editable.

method.name: set_expand_right
method.description: If [code]true[/code], column [code]column[/code] is expanded to the right.

method.name: set_icon
method.description: Sets the given column's icon [Texture2D].

method.name: set_icon_max_width
method.description: Sets the given column's icon's maximum width.

method.name: set_icon_modulate
method.description: Modulates the given column's icon with [code]modulate[/code].

method.name: set_icon_region
method.description: Sets the given column's icon's texture region.

method.name: set_indeterminate
method.description: If [code]true[/code], the column [code]column[/code] is marked indeterminate. [b]Note:[/b] If set [code]true[/code] from [code]false[/code], then column is cleared of checked status.

method.name: set_language
method.description: Sets language code of item's text used for line-breaking and text shaping algorithms, if left empty current locale is used instead.

method.name: set_metadata
method.description: Sets the metadata value for the given column, which can be retrieved later using [method get_metadata]. This can be used, for example, to store a reference to the original data.

method.name: set_opentype_feature
method.description: Sets OpenType feature [code]tag[/code] for the item's text.

method.name: set_range
method.description: Sets the value of a [constant CELL_MODE_RANGE] column.

method.name: set_range_config
method.description: Sets the range of accepted values for a column. The column must be in the [constant CELL_MODE_RANGE] mode. If [code]expr[/code] is [code]true[/code], the edit mode slider will use an exponential scale as with [member Range.exp_edit].

method.name: set_selectable
method.description: If [code]true[/code], the given column is selectable.

method.name: set_suffix
method.description: Sets a string to be shown after a column's value (for example, a unit abbreviation).

method.name: set_text
method.description: Sets the given column's text value.

method.name: set_text_alignment
method.description: Sets the given column's text alignment. See [enum HorizontalAlignment] for possible values.

method.name: set_text_direction
method.description: Sets item's text base writing direction.

method.name: set_tooltip
method.description: Sets the given column's tooltip text.

members.member: If [code]true[/code], folding is disabled for this TreeItem.
